company_description: TrueLayer is a fintech company that specializes in providing open banking APIs (Application Programming Interfaces). Their APIs enable developers to securely access financial data and initiate payments from bank accounts. TrueLayer’s technology allows for seamless integration with banking systems, enabling innovative financial products and services such as personal finance management apps, payment initiation, and account verification.
seed_investors: Moffu Labs, Connect Ventures, Graph Ventures
